detection.question: How does the Aerilux Pro detect pigeons?
detection.answer: The Aerilux Pro uses advanced AI algorithms and computer vision to identify pigeons with 99.9% accuracy. The system continuously learns and adapts to local pigeon behavior patterns for maximum effectiveness.

harmful.question: Is the system harmful to birds?
harmful.answer: No, the Aerilux Pro is completely humane. It uses sound and light patterns to deter pigeons without causing any harm to birds or humans.

coverage.question: What is the coverage area of one unit?
coverage.answer: Each Aerilux Pro unit provides 360Â° coverage with a 50ft (15m) radius, making it ideal for most commercial and residential properties.

battery.question: How long does the battery last?
battery.answer: The system is solar-powered with a 30-day battery backup. In most conditions, the solar panel provides sufficient power for continuous operation.

remote.question: Can I control the system remotely?
remote.answer: Yes, the Aerilux Pro comes with a mobile app that allows you to monitor and control your device remotely, receive real-time notifications, and adjust settings from anywhere.

installation.title: Installation Guide
installation.intro: Installing your Aerilux Pro is simple and requires no wiring. Follow these steps:

steps.location: Choose an optimal location with good visibility and sunlight exposure
steps.mount: Mount the device using the included mounting bracket (screws provided)
steps.solar: Ensure the solar panel faces south (in Northern Hemisphere) for maximum efficiency
steps.app: Download the Aerilux mobile app and pair your device
steps.configure: Configure detection zones and sensitivity settings via the app
steps.test: Test the system to ensure proper operation

installation.professional: For professional installation services, please contact our support team. We offer installation services for commercial properties and can provide custom mounting solutions for unique requirements.

warranty.title: Warranty & Support
warranty.intro: Every Aerilux Pro comes with a comprehensive 2-year warranty covering:

items.weather: Weather-related damage (IP67 rated for all conditions)

warranty.support: Our warranty includes 24/7 technical support and remote diagnostics. Extended warranty options are available for commercial installations. For warranty claims or support, contact our team through the form above or email support@aerilux.io.

careers.title: Join Our Team
careers.intro: At Aerilux, we're building the future of urban cleanliness through innovative AI technology. We're always looking for talented individuals to join our mission.
careers.hiring: We're currently hiring for positions in:
careers.apply: To apply, please send your resume and cover letter to careers@aerilux.io or use the contact form above with the subject "Career Application". We review all applications and will reach out to qualified candidates.

section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.content: At Aerilux, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website, use our products, or interact with our services. By using our services, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

section2.title: 2. Information We Collect
section2.intro: We collect only the minimal information necessary to provide you with a quote for our products and services. The information we collect includes:
section2.item1: Contact information: Name and email address (required to send you a quote)
section2.item2: Optional information: Phone number and company name (if provided to better understand your needs)
section2.item3: Project details: Information about your property or requirements (if provided in your inquiry)
section2.subcontent1: We automatically collect basic technical information when you visit our website, including your IP address, browser type, and pages visited. This information is used solely for website functionality and analytics to improve user experience. We do not use this information to identify you personally.

section3.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
section3.intro: We use the information you provide solely for the following purposes:
section3.item1: To prepare and send you a personalized quote for our products and services
section3.item2: To respond to your inquiries and provide customer support
section3.item3: To communicate with you regarding your quote request (if you have provided contact information)
section3.item4: To improve our website functionality and user experience (using anonymized analytics data)

section4.title: 4. Data Sharing and Disclosure
section4.content: We do not sell, rent, or trade your personal information. We only share your information in the following limited circumstances:
section4.subcontent1: We may share your contact information with trusted service providers who assist us in operating our website (such as email service providers for sending quotes), provided they agree to keep this information confidential and use it solely for the purpose of providing services to us.
section4.subcontent2: We may disclose your information if required by law or in response to valid requests by public authorities. We will only share the minimum information necessary to comply with such requirements.

section5.title: 5. Your Rights
section5.intro: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights regarding your personal information:
section5.item1: Right to access: Request a copy of the personal information we hold about you
section5.item2: Right to rectification: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete data
section5.item3: Right to erasure: Request deletion of your personal information
section5.item4: Right to restrict processing: Request limitation of how we use your data
section5.item5: Right to data portability: Request transfer of your data to another service
section5.item6: Right to object: Opt-out of certain data processing activities

section6.title: 6. Data Security
section6.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure.
section6.subcontent1: We use encryption, secure servers, access controls, and regular security audits to protect your data.

section7.title: 7. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
section7.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our website and store certain information. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent. However, if you do not accept cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of our website.

section8.title: 8. Children's Privacy
section8.content: Our services are not intended for children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us immediately.

section9.title: 9. Contact Us
section9.intro: If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at:

section1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
section1.content: By accessing and using the Aerilux website, purchasing our products, or using our services, you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this site and our services.

section2.title: 2. Use License and Restrictions
section2.content: Permission is granted to temporarily access and use the Aerilux website and services for personal, non-commercial use only. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title, and under this license you may not:
section2.subcontent1: Modify or copy the materials; use the materials for any commercial purpose or for any public display; attempt to reverse engineer any software contained on the website; remove any copyright or other proprietary notations from the materials; or transfer the materials to another person or 'mirror' the materials on any other server.
section2.subcontent2: This license shall automatically terminate if you violate any of these restrictions and may be terminated by Aerilux at any time. Upon terminating your viewing of these materials or upon the termination of this license, you must destroy any downloaded materials in your possession.

section3.title: 3. Product Warranty and Limitations
section3.intro: All Aerilux products come with a limited warranty covering:
section3.item1: 2-year warranty on hardware defects and manufacturing issues
section3.item2: 1-year warranty on battery performance and capacity
section3.item4: Warranty is void if the product is modified, misused, or damaged due to negligence
section3.note: The warranty does not cover normal wear and tear, damage from accidents, or unauthorized repairs. For warranty claims, please contact our support team with proof of purchase.

section4.title: 4. Limitation of Liability
section4.content: In no event shall Aerilux or its suppliers be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit, or due to business interruption) arising out of the use or inability to use Aerilux products or services, even if Aerilux or an authorized representative has been notified orally or in writing of the possibility of such damage.
section4.item1: Aerilux's total liability shall not exceed the amount paid by you for the product or service
section4.item2: Aerilux is not responsible for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages
section4.item3: Some jurisdictions do not allow limitations on implied warranties or limitations of liability for incidental or consequential damages, so these limitations may not apply to you

section5.title: 5. Shipping, Returns, and Refunds
section5.intro: Our shipping and return policies are as follows:
section5.item1: Free shipping on all orders over $100. Standard shipping takes 5-7 business days
section5.item2: 30-day return policy for unopened products in original packaging
section5.item3: Customer is responsible for return shipping costs unless the product is defective
section5.item4: Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days after we receive and inspect the returned product
section5.subcontent1: To initiate a return, contact our customer service team with your order number. All returned items must be in their original condition with all accessories and packaging included.

section6.title: 6. Intellectual Property
section6.content: All content on the Aerilux website, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, images, audio clips, digital downloads, and software, is the property of Aerilux or its content suppliers and is protected by international copyright and trademark laws.

section7.title: 7. User Accounts and Responsibilities
section7.content: If you create an account on our website, you are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password and for restricting access to your computer. You agree to accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account.
section7.subcontent1: You must immediately notify us of any unauthorized use of your account or any other breach of security. We will not be liable for any loss or damage arising from your failure to comply with this section.

section8.title: 8. Privacy Policy
section8.content: Your use of our website and services is also governed by our Privacy Policy. Please review our Privacy Policy, which also governs the Site and informs users of our data collection and usage practices.

section9.title: 9. Governing Law
section9.content: These Terms of Service are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of Israel, without regard to its conflict of law provisions. You irrevocably submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts located in Haifa, Israel for the resolution of any disputes.

section10.title: 10. Contact Information
section10.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at:

section1.title: 1. Company Information
section1.content: This website is operated by Aerilux, a company specializing in AI-powered pigeon deterrent systems. The following information is provided in accordance with legal requirements.

section2.title: 2. Company Details
section2.content: Aerilux is committed to providing innovative solutions for urban bird control while maintaining the highest standards of quality and service.
section2.subcontent1: Aerilux operates as a registered business entity in Israel. Our company registration number and official business address are available upon request for business inquiries.
section2.subcontent2: Our main office is located at Chicago 136, Haifa, Israel. For all business correspondence, please use this address or contact us via email at sales@aerilux.io.
section2.subcontent3: Aerilux is registered for VAT purposes. Our VAT number is available upon request for business customers and will be provided on all invoices.

section3.title: 3. Website Hosting and Technical Information
section3.content: This website is hosted and maintained to ensure optimal performance and security for our users.
section3.item1: Hosting Provider: Information available upon request
section3.item2: Content Management: The website is managed by Aerilux's technical team
section3.item3: Security: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect user data
section3.item4: Cookies: This website uses cookies to enhance user experience. For more information, see our Privacy Policy.

section4.title: 4. Intellectual Property
section4.content: All content, trademarks, logos, and intellectual property displayed on this website are the exclusive property of Aerilux or are used with permission.
section4.item1: Copyright: All website content is protected by copyright laws
section4.item2: Trademarks: Aerilux and related marks are trademarks of Aerilux
section4.item3: Unauthorized use of any materials from this website is strictly prohibited

section5.title: 5. Liability and Disclaimers
section5.content: While we strive to provide accurate and up-to-date information, Aerilux makes no warranties or representations about the accuracy, reliability, or completeness of the information on this website.
section5.subcontent1: Product specifications, features, and availability are subject to change without notice. We reserve the right to modify or discontinue products at any time.
section5.subcontent2: Aerilux does not guarantee that the website will be available at all times. We may experience downtime for maintenance, updates, or due to technical issues beyond our control.

section6.title: 6. Contact and Legal Inquiries
section6.content: For legal inquiries, compliance questions, or to exercise your rights under applicable data protection laws, please contact us:
